text: Na mgbe ochie nʼala Izrel,4:7 Dit 25:7-10 ime ka mgbapụta ihe na iwefe ihe site nʼaka baa nʼaka zuo oke, otu onye ga-eyipụ akpụkpọụkwụ4:7 Gbaa mba niile dị nʼetiti ọwụwa anyanwụ gburugburu, akpụkpọụkwụ bụ ihe na-egosipụta onye nwe ihe. Mgbe mmadụ nyere onye ọzọ akpụkpọụkwụ ya, nʼihi ihe ọbụla, nke a pụtara inye ya ikike i sị, site ugbu a gawa ihe ahụ a bụrụla nke gị. Abụ 60:8; Ems 2:6; 8:6 ya were ya nye onye nke ọzọ. Otu a ka e si ekpebi okwu gbasara orire na ọzụzụ, na-ime ka ihe ndị ọzọ guzosie ike nʼala Izrel.
